completeOwnershipTransfer().details: Sets proposedOwner to owner and proposedOwner to 0; only callable by proposedOwner; emits OwnershipTransferCompleted event

initiateOwnershipTransfer(address).details: Takes _proposedOwner; sets proposedOwner to _proposedOwner; only callable by owner; emits OwnershipTransferInitiated event

title: Owned - Implements basic ownership with 2-step transfers
